languages.text: "Интересные у тебя запросы, конечно. Кетца Темер — планетка с той еще печальной историей. Некогда она приносила моему прапрадеду тонны сочных фруктов и тысячи грузовых контейнеров особого строительного волокна, вырабатываемого из местных лесов. Людишки жили себе в крупных городах, сторонясь путанных троп и деревьев. Ну а потом идиллию нарушили рейды ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "Интересные у тебя запросы, конечно. Кетца-аль Хет — планетка с той еще печальной историей. Некогда она приносила моему прапрадеду тонны сочных фруктов и тысячи грузовых контейнеров особого строительного волокна, вырабатываемого из месных лесов. Людишки жили себе в крупных городах, сторонясь путанных троп и деревьев. Ну а потом идилию нарушили рейды ксеносов".

languages.text: "Your enquiries are curious, to be sure. Quetza Temer is a planet with a rather dreary backstory. A long time ago, it supplied my great-grandfather with tonnes of succulent fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The population all lived in large cities a safe distance away from the tangled paths and trees. And then this quiet life was dashed by xenos raids."
languages.original_text: "Интересные у тебя запросы, конечно. Кетца Темер — планетка с той еще печальной историей. Некогда она приносила моему прапрадеду тонны сочных фруктов и тысячи грузовых контейнеров особого строительного волокна, вырабатываемого из местных лесов. Людишки жили себе в крупных городах, сторонясь путанных троп и деревьев. Ну а потом идиллию нарушили рейды ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "Your requests are strange for sure. Quetza Temer is planet with a rather sad backstory. A long time ago, my great-grandfather collected tons of juicy fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The locals avoided the tangled paths and the trees, dwelling in the big cities. And then the peace was dashed by the xenos raids."

"Your requests are strange for sure. Quetza Temer is planet with a rather sad backstory. A long time ago, my great-grandfather collected tons of juicy fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The locals avoided the tangled paths and the trees, dwelling in the big cities. And then the peace was dashed by the xenos raids."

A long time ago, my great-grandfather collected tons of juicy fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The locals avoided the tangled paths and the trees, dwelling in the big cities. And then the peace was dashed by the xenos raids."

A long time ago, it supplied my great-grandfather with tonnes of succulent fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The population all lived in large cities a safe distance away from the tangled paths and trees. And then this quiet life was dashed by xenos raids."

"Your enquiries are curious, to be sure. Quetza Temer is a planet with a rather dreary backstory. A long time ago, it supplied my great-grandfather with tonnes of succulent fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The population all lived in large cities a safe distance away from the tangled paths and trees. And then this quiet life was dashed by xenos raids."

languages.text: «Hace usted unas preguntas muy extrañas, eso está claro. Quetza Temer es un planeta con una historia triste. Hace mucho tiempo, mi bisabuelo recolectó toneladas de jugosos frutos y llenó miles de contenedores de carga con una fibra especial para la construcción, procesada a partir de la madera local. Los lugareños evitaban la espesura y moraban en grandes ciudades situadas a una distancia prudencial de la maraña de caminos y árboles. Hasta que llegaron los xenos y quebraron la paz con sus incursiones».
languages.original_text: "Your enquiries are curious, to be sure. Quetza Temer is a planet with a rather dreary backstory. A long time ago, it supplied my great-grandfather with tonnes of succulent fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The population all lived in large cities a safe distance away from the tangled paths and trees. And then this quiet life was dashed by xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene usted unas peticiones muy extrañas, eso está claro. Quetza Temer es un planeta con una historia bastante triste. Hace mucho tiempo, mi bisabuelo recolectó toneladas de jugosos frutos y llenó miles de contenedores de carga con una fibra especial para la construcción, procesada a partir de la madera local. Los lugareños evitaban la espesura y moraban en grandes ciudades. Y entonces llegaron los xenos y quebraron la paz con sus incursiones».

languages.text: “老实说，你的要求还真有意思。格扎尔特默这颗行星过去相当不怎么样。很久以前，我的曾祖父在这里收获过无数多汁的水果，而当地森林加工出的特殊建筑纤维，能装满几千个集装箱。所有当地人都住在大城市里，远离那些错综复杂的荒野小路和森林。然而，异形的袭击打破了这里的和平。”
languages.original_text: "Your enquiries are curious, to be sure. Quetza Temer is a planet with a rather dreary backstory. A long time ago, it supplied my great-grandfather with tonnes of succulent fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The population all lived in large cities a safe distance away from the tangled paths and trees. And then this quiet life was dashed by xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: “你的要求还真奇怪。格扎尔特默这颗行星有着悲惨的过去。很久以前，我的曾祖父在这里收获过无数多汁的水果，而当地森林加工出的特殊建筑纤维，能装满几千个集装箱。当地人住在大城市里，远离那些错综复杂的荒野小路和森林，直到异形的袭击打破了这里的和平。”

languages.text: « Vous posez des questions bien étranges... Quetza Temer est une planète à l'histoire fort triste. Il y a bien longtemps, mon arrière-grand-père récoltait dans ses forêts des tonnes de fruits et des conteneurs entiers d'une fibre spéciale utilisée en construction. Les autochtones évitaient les chemins tortueux et les arbres, préférant vivre dans de grandes villes. Puis leur paisible mode de vie a été anéanti lorsque les xénos sont arrivés. »
languages.original_text: "Your enquiries are curious, to be sure. Quetza Temer is a planet with a rather dreary backstory. A long time ago, it supplied my great-grandfather with tonnes of succulent fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The population all lived in large cities a safe distance away from the tangled paths and trees. And then this quiet life was dashed by xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: « Vous posez des questions étranges... C'est une planète à l'histoire triste. Il y a bien longtemps, mon arrière-grand-père récoltait dans ces forêts des tonnes de fruits juteux et des conteneurs entiers d'une fibre spéciale utilisée en construction. Les autochtones évitaient les chemins tortueux et les arbres, préférant vivre dans les grandes villes. Puis la paix a été anéantie lorsque les xénos sont arrivés. »

languages.text: 「お前の要求は実に奇妙だ。ケツァ・テメルは、非常に悲しい裏話のある惑星なのさ。はるか昔、俺の曽祖父は何トンものジューシーな果実と、特殊な建築用繊維を詰めた何千もの貨物コンテナを現地の森から集めていた。現地の人々は、絡み合った道や木々を避け、大都市に住んでいた。そして、その平和は異種族の襲撃によって破られた」
languages.original_text: "Your enquiries are curious, to be sure. Quetza Temer is a planet with a rather dreary backstory. A long time ago, it supplied my great-grandfather with tonnes of succulent fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The population all lived in large cities a safe distance away from the tangled paths and trees. And then this quiet life was dashed by xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の要求は実に奇妙だ。ケツァ・テメルは、非常に悲しい裏話のある惑星なのさ。はるか昔、俺の曽祖父は何トンものジューシーな果実と、特殊な建築用繊維を詰めた何千もの貨物コンテナを現地の森から集めていた。現地の人々は、絡み合った道や木々を避け、大都市に住んでいた。そして、その平和は異種族の襲撃によって破られた」

languages.text: "Eure Fragen sind sonderbar. Quetza Temer ist ein Planet mit einer recht tristen Geschichte. Vor langer Zeit hat mein Urgroßvater hier tonnenweise saftige Früchte gesammelt und tausende von Frachtcontainern mit einer speziellen Baufaser gefüllt, die aus den Pflanzen in den örtlichen Wäldern hergestellt wurde. Die Bevölkerung lebte in großen Städten in sicherer Entfernung von den verworrenen Pfaden und Bäumen. Und dann wurde dieses friedliche Leben durch Xenos-Angriffe zerstört."
languages.original_text: "Your enquiries are curious, to be sure. Quetza Temer is a planet with a rather dreary backstory. A long time ago, it supplied my great-grandfather with tonnes of succulent fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The population all lived in large cities a safe distance away from the tangled paths and trees. And then this quiet life was dashed by xenos raids."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr stellt wirklich merkwürdige Bitten. Quetza Temer ist ein Planet mit einer recht traurigen Geschichte. Vor langer Zeit hat mein Urgroßvater tonnenweise saftige Früchte gesammelt und tausende von Frachtcontainern mit einer speziellen Baufaser gefüllt, die aus den Pflanzen in den örtlichen Wäldern hergestellt wurde. Die Einheimischen damals mieden die überwucherten Pfade und die Bäume, sie lebten in großen Städten. Und dann wurde der Frieden von Angriffen der Xenos zerstört."

languages.text: "Sorularının merak uyandırdığına kuşku yok. Quetza Temer, biraz kasvetli bir geçmişe sahip bir gezegendir. Uzun vakitler evvel büyük büyük babama tonlarca sulu meyve ve yapılarda kullanılmak üzere yerel ormandan üretilen, özel bir lifle dolu binlerce kargo konteyneri sağlardı. Tüm nüfus, iç içe geçmiş yollar ve ağaçlardan uzakta, güvenli bir mesafedeki büyük şehirlerde yaşardı. Sonrasındaysa bu huzur dolu hayat, zeno baskınlarıyla lekelendi."
languages.original_text: "Your enquiries are curious, to be sure. Quetza Temer is a planet with a rather dreary backstory. A long time ago, it supplied my great-grandfather with tonnes of succulent fruits and thousands of cargo containers filled with a special building fibre processed from the local forests. The population all lived in large cities a safe distance away from the tangled paths and trees. And then this quiet life was dashed by xenos raids."
